sentence.Network_en: Many migratory birds visit this lake annually.

sentence.Network_en: This does not negate the idea of migratory aptitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 这并没有否定迁移能力这一概念.

sentence.Network_cn: 沙脊呈平行的 、 微弓形排列,这能反映滨线迁移的历史.

entry.tran: (鱼类、鸟兽)迁徙的，迁移的，移栖的
entry.def: A migratory bird, fish, or animal is one that migrates every year.
Migratory means relating to the migration of people, birds, fish, or animals.

means.word_mean: 1. used of animals that move seasonally;
2. habitually moving from place to place especially in search of seasonal work;

sentences.sentence: "appalled by the social conditions of migrant life"

stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+migr迁移+ant……的→adj.移来的,移民的
migrate[v.迁移,移居[国外]]+ory……的→adj.迁移的,流浪的
e出+migr迁移+ant人→n.移居外国者, 移民

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移民出境, 侨居, [总称]移民
stems_affixes.word_buile: emigrate自本国移居他乡+ion动作或状态→emigration移民出境

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移居者[尤指因政治因素而移居外国者],流亡者
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+migr移+e→n.移居者[尤指因政治因素而移居外国者],流亡者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外来的移民, 移居入境
stems_affixes.word_buile: immigrate移居入境+ion动作或状态→immigration移居入境
migr迁移+ant人或物→迁移的鸟→候鸟

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移民, 移植, 移往, 移动
stems_affixes.word_buile: migrate迁移,移居+ion动作或状态→migration移民;移往
trans变换+migrate[v.迁移,移居[国外]]→v.[宗]轮回, 移居
